desc: This transformation parallelly add twitter type text to samples(source and target data).

ori.source: The school yard renovation was originally planned back in 2008/2009, however, high unplanned expenses meant that the work had to be pushed back.
ori.target: Ursprünglich war die Schulhofsanierung sogar schon in den Jahren 2008/2009 geplant, doch hohe unplanmäßige Ausgaben brachten eine Verschiebung.

trans.source: https://knVi.zA9h/MH9c The school yard renovation was originally planned back in 2008/2009, however, high unplanned expenses meant that the work had to be pushed back.
trans.target: https://knVi.zA9h/MH9c Ursprünglich war die Schulhofsanierung sogar schon in den Jahren 2008/2009 geplant, doch hohe unplanmäßige Ausgaben brachten eine Verschiebung.

ori.source: Consequently, they will be particularly motivated playing against their former coach.
ori.target: Von daher werden sie gegen ihren Ex-Coach sicher ganz besonders motiviert sein.

trans.source: Consequently, they will be particularly motivated playing against their former coach. https://7a.NO/6F
